entries.meaning: A person, thing or name typifying a certain quality or idea; an embodiment or exemplification.
examples: Adolf Hitler was the personification of anti-Semitism.

entries.meaning: A literary device in which an inanimate object or an idea is given human qualities.
examples: The writer used personification to convey her ideas.

entries.meaning: An artistic representation of an abstract quality as a human
examples: The Grim Reaper is a personification of death.
